product.title: One Fish Two Fish Red Fish Blue Fish | Book Club by Early Moments
product.ingress:
In the perennial children’s favorite One Fish Two Fish Red Fish Blue Fish, Dr. Seuss introduces young readers to the concepts of rhyme, numbers, and basic colors. Filled with imaginative creatures like Gacks and Zans and his signature style of illustration, One Fish Two Fish Red Fish Blue Fish by Dr. Seuss is sure to find a special place in your child’s collection!

Tie-in Activity: Keep playing with descriptive words. Dress your baby with one blue sock and one red sock, then say, “One sock, two socks, red sock, blue sock” while gently wiggling her feet. Or let an older child sort toys into piles while you change the verse to fit, such as “One car, two cars, old car, new car.”
